title: CHLOR OUT (Powder)
long_description: CHLOR OUT quickly lowers the chlorine level in pool water so that you can enjoy your pool right away. CHLOR OUT will not discolour vinyl, concrete or fiberglass pools.

characteristics.title: Application method
characteristics.text: Pour CHLOR OUT directly onto the surface of the water while walking all around the pool.

characteristics.title: Instructions
characteristics.text: Add CHLOR OUT according to the application method and recommended dosage. Pool can be used immediately after adding the product.

dosage.specifications: Add 15 g of CHLOR OUT per 10,000 L of water to lower chlorine by 1 ppm.

columns.name: POOL SIZE
rows: TO LOWER CHLORINE LEVEL BY 1 PPM

warning: Compatible with salt systems. DO NOT apply the product when people are in the pool.
